oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup - 1946-07-27 - KOMA - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part two of a performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on July 27, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Prairie Songbirds; Dick Reinhart; Chuck Davis; Little Willie; Mary Lou; Homegrown Trio
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) The Prairie Songbirds perform "Home Sweet Home On The Prairie" / (2:18) Hiram Higsby tells a joke / (3:20) Dick Reinhart performs "Fort Worth Jail" / (6:10) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (6:27) Chuck Davis and Little Willie [phonetic] perform [Unidentified polka song] / (8:27) Hiram Higsby tells a joke / (9:00) Mary Lou performs "Texas Plains" / (10:47) Hiram Higsby tells a joke / (11:11) The Homegrown Trio performs "The Old Rugged Cross" / (12:51) Chuck Davis performs a square dance / (14:24) Closing statements and theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Reinhart, Dick; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975;
